âœ… **Apex Motors campaign has been paused successfully**

**Changes Applied:**
- Campaign status changed from **active** to **paused**

**Impact:**
- Delivery has been stopped completely (reach reduced by 100%)
- No further spend will occur until the campaign is resumed

**Notifications:**
- Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- Email draft generated for ta.khongsap@gmail.com

The campaign is now paused and will not serve any more impressions until you resume it. Let me know if you need anything else!
